Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
Controller class for handling administrator-related operations in the hospital management system. This class provides functionalities for managing hospital staff, viewing and managing doctor schedules, handling appointments, and managing medication inventory.
